::Reptilica/Striker/Ramulus::

Reptilica stumbles back from Starscream's slap, taking out both guns and 
aiming them at Starscream. With a few barely audible commands into his comm, 
the autoguns aim at Starscream again, ready to fire.

"Listen," Reptilica says, growling, "You're at the Alliance base, and that 
kind of behaviour will get you killed. On me command, these autoguns open 
fire and kill you. And they'd do the same to Megatron. He's not a threat, I 
don't even think he has a faction to lead."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A shot hits Striker in the back, the Maximal spinning around. He growls when 
he sees the attackers coming toward the Ark. Didn't they ever stop?!

He opens fire on Savage, wondering why these bots were trying to destroy time 
by killing the Ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus nods, walking over to Brix and Fliq and helping with attatching the 
panel.

"Think it'll hold?" he asks, working on it.
